title: padari manamayarndu
sahitya:
padari manamayarndu varundum pEdaiyidam parAmukhamum tagumO padam ninaindu


anupallavi

  udarit-taLLinAl vEru pughaliDam Edu un padattANai peN pAvam pollAdu
unakkum enakkum uLLa uravinil onrum oLivu maraivillai ulagam arindadu
enaik-kaiviDuvadu nIdtyanru ulagellAm shirikkumE pollA madan kaNaiyil


caraNam    pOTrip-paNiyum rAmadASanai shivanE purak-kaNittAl vazhakkil pOrADuvEn adil
tOTrAlum aDangAdun mAnattaik-kappalil ETruvEn pulambit-tUTruvEn Adalin
tuNindu vandETrukkoL tuDikka viDAdE shonnEn namakkuL manastApam aDAdE
aNaindenait-tAnga palaiyaik-kaiviDAdE anniyarennait-toDAdE ninaindu ninaindu
